scripts.dev:x: mkdir -p dist/api && rsync -am --include='*.gql' --include='*/' --exclude='*' src/modules dist/api && prisma-import -s src/**/*.prisma -o dist/schema.prisma && prisma generate --schema=./dist/schema.prisma && tsc -w
scripts.dev:w: xcopy src\modules\*.gql dist\api\ /S /-y && prisma-import -s src/**/*.prisma -o dist/schema.prisma && prisma generate --schema=./dist/schema.prisma && tsc -w
scripts.db:dev: prisma-import -s src/**/*.prisma -o dist/schema.prisma && prisma generate --schema=./dist/schema.prisma && prisma migrate dev --schema=./dist/schema.prisma
